feed.title: Anudhyan’s Log
feed.subtitle: notes on life, learning and optimization.

entry.title: Hello, World!
entry.content:
Here’s to starting this blog with the archetypal introductory greeting in computer programming.

My goals for starting this blog are twofold. Firstly, I want to understand bits of computer science and math better by writing short posts explaining what I learnt. After all, teaching is the best way to learn.

Secondly, I want to improve my writing skills by practicing regularly, and I’m hoping that having a blog would provide extra motivation to write.

Here is my previous attempt at blogging, from many years ago.

I hope to have a long-running blog, full of interesting posts!
entry.summary: Here’s to starting this blog with the archetypal introductory greeting in computer programming.
